Uses of Interface
com.cyc.kb.ArgPosition

  • Packages that use ArgPosition 
    Package Description
    com.cyc.kb
    Provides basic interfaces for manipulating CycL-based java objects, both for the purpose of making assertions and for retrieving terms and values via simple queries.
    com.cyc.kb.client
    The implementation of various interfaces specified in com.cyc.kb, refer to that package for a more detailed discussion of using the API.
    com.cyc.km.modeling.task
    Provides the classes for representing and working with tasks.

      Destructively modify this ArgPosition to be its parent arg position.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<ArgPosition> Sentence.getArgPositionsForTerm(Object term)
      Returns a set of arg positions that describe all the locations where the given term can be found in this formula.
